snippet: The Senate majority leader Harry Reid, a Democrat, has long been publicly contemptuous of Mitt Romney, a fellow Mormon.
abstract: Senate majority leader Harry Reid, who has long been publicly contemptuous of Mitt Romney, has drawn angry retorts from Republicans and Romney with his claims that Romney has not paid taxes in a decade.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr

lead_paragraph: The Senate majority leader Harry Reid, a Democrat, has long been publicly contemptuous of Mitt Romney, a fellow Mormon.

headline.seo: Harry Reid Has Long History of Romney Bashing
headline.main: In Reid’s Taunting of Romney, Taxes Are Just a New Opening
headline.print_headline: Reid Has Long History Of Going After Romney
